content: The Blood Stained Needle is one of the final Key Items you will find in Black Myth: Wukong. It is automatically given to you upon exploring The Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_Stained_Needle.md', within the main section titled 'Blood Stained Needle'.
The content is as follows:
The Blood Stained Needle is one of the final Key Items you will find in Black Myth: Wukong. It is automatically given to you upon exploring The Webbed Hollow.
